marklogic.body: This: goo.gl/vNQ9K. It works, I promise. I just recommended this to another xoJaner a couple of days ago. Seriously, just rub it on your thighs (and perhaps a midday re-application if you are walking a lot) and you are good to go. It's one of my miracle, can't-live-without products and I Always have two or three stockpiled. Tip: You can also use it to prevent blisters on your feet from sandals; just dab some of the product in the Spot you know will get irritated and it won't.
